overview: Alan Berezin has almost 25 years experience in software development and engineering. He started in a consulting role for Drillinginfo, and soon afterwards joined as the CTO. His prior experience includes independent consulting, engineering management at Advanced Micro Devices, and software development in networking and signal processing technologies. As CTO, Alan manages IT, software development, and technology operations. He received a B.A. in Physics from UC Berkeley and a Ph.D. in Physics from The University of Texas at Austin.
